name: Amerinational Management Services (AMS)
tag_list: martial-arts-billing, martial-arts-school-management, martial-arts-software, marketing, promotion, advertising, website-design, webinars, consulting, after-school-programs, summer-camp-programs
overview:
AMS provides billing, marketing, and management services to Martial Arts Schools nationwide and in Canada. We have a variety of convenient payment options for students, along with professional collection services.

Our software saves school owners time and money with reports that organize and detail attendance, belt rankings, marketing efforts, point-of-sale system, EventHub, automated email, and much more!

We offer print-ready marketing materials and promotion ideas, After School and Summer Camp programs with full curriculum options and newsletters.

AMS also has available website design, informative webinars, and unlimited consulting for staff development, student enrollment and retention.
